leistungen.sustainability.title: Sustainability Is Our Standard
leistungen.sustainability.intro: Sustainability is not an add-on â€“ we build resource-efficiently by default. At S&S Messebau, every stand is a sustainability project.
leistungen.sustainability.co2.title: COâ‚‚ Offset for Transport
leistungen.sustainability.co2.desc: We offset our transport journeys with certified COâ‚‚ compensation â€“ for a climate-conscious trade show appearance.
leistungen.sustainability.systembau.desc: We consistently rely on modular systems that are reused and adapted â€“ no disposables, no waste.
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.title: Every Stand a Sustainability Project
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.desc: Every project is planned with sustainability in mind: materials, logistics, reuse â€“ considered from the very start.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.title: How We Live Sustainability â€“ Every Day
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text1: Our team drives with COâ‚‚ offset, no parts end up in the trash â€“ our comeback system and consistent repair come before disposal.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text2: Reusable elements are professionally stored after each trade show and prepared for the next deployment. This saves our clients up to 60% of materials â€“ while protecting the environment.
leistungen.sustainability.outro: Find details, facts and certificates about our sustainable approach on our Sustainability page.
sustainability.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction
sustainability.subtitle: Environmentally conscious, cost-efficient, future-oriented â€“ our approach to sustainable exhibition construction.
sustainability.reuse.desc: Modular stand systems that can be used across multiple trade shows â€“ saving materials and costs.
sustainability.materials.desc: FSC-certified wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials for an environmentally conscious presentation.
sustainability.logistics.desc: Optimized transport planning and bundled deliveries reduce COâ‚‚ emissions.
sustainability.savings.desc: From the 2nd trade show onwards, sustainable systems pay for themselves â€“ good for the environment and your budget.
